<template>
    <va-navbar
      color="primary"
      class="mb-3"
    >
      <template #left>
        <va-navbar-item class="logo">
          To-Do List
        </va-navbar-item>
      </template>
      <template #right>
        <va-navbar-item><router-link v-bind:style="{ 'color': 'white' }" class="nav-link" to="/add/">Add</router-link></va-navbar-item>
       
        <va-navbar-item>
          <va-icon
            name="mdi-magnify"
            color="textInverted"
          />
        </va-navbar-item>
        <va-navbar-item>
          <va-icon
            name="mdi-account-circle-outline"
            color="textInverted"
          />
        </va-navbar-item>
      </template>
    </va-navbar>
  
   <List/>
   <router-view />
  </template>

<script>
import List from '@/components/list.vue'
export default {
    name: 'NavBar',
    components:{
        List
    }
}
  </script>
  
  <!-- Add "scoped" attribute to limit CSS to this component only -->
  <style scoped>
  h3 {
    margin: 40px 0 0;
  }
  ul {
    list-style-type: none;
    padding: 0;
  }
  li {
    display: inline-block;
    margin: 0 10px;
  }
  a {
    color: #42b983;
  }
  </style>
